text: Hilkiah the priest, Ahikam, Acbor, Shaphan, and Asaiah went and spoke to Huldah the prophetess, the wife of Shallum, son of Tokhath, the son of Hasrah, custodian of the wardrobe.22:14. “Wardrobe”: either the king's clothes, or those of the priest (s). She lived in Jerusalem, in the city's second quarter.
